sourcesContent:
<template>
  <vBasePage
    :searchOptions="searchOptions"
    :buttonOptions="buttonOptions"
    :editOptions="editOptions"
    :tableOption="tableOption"
    @rowBlock="rowClick"
  ></vBasePage>
</template>

<script>
import vBasePage from "../../BasePage/BasePage";
import ShellApi from "../webapi/ShellGlobal";
import config from "@/config/index";

var TableUniqueId = "appId";
var TerminalType = {
  "1": "总控",
  "2": "分控",
  "3": "HubApp",
  "4": "CCN"
};
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      searchOptions: {
        searchOptions: {
          requiredCondition: false
        },
        seleFunc: {
          export: false,
          search: true
        },
        // exportUrl: ShellApi.GetAppInfoList,
        search_controls: [
          {
            type: "v_singleSelect",
            title: "部署点",
            key: "OrganiztionId",
            apiUrl: ShellApi.GetOrganiztionList,
            //params: { aaa: "fff" },
            selectkey: "organiztionId",
            selectvalue: "organiztionSN"
          },
          {
            type: "v_singleSelect",
            title: "状态",
            key: "isDelete",
            data: [
              {
                typeid: 0,
                typename: "启用"
              },
              {
                typeid: 1,
                typename: "禁用"
              }
            ],
            selectkey: "typeid",
            selectvalue: "typename"
          },
          {
            type: "v_singleSelect",
            title: "设备类型",
            key: "TerminalType",
            data: [
              {
                id: "1",
                value: "总控"
              },
              {
                id: "2",
                value: "分控"
              },
              {
                id: "3",
                value: "HubApp"
              },
              {
                id: "4",
                value: "CCN"
              }
            ],
            selectkey: "id",
            selectvalue: "value"
          }
        ]
      },
      buttonOptions: [
        {
          title: "添加",
          key: "add",
          enable: true,
          iconStr: "fa-plus"
        }
      ],
      editOptions: {
        dynamicEdits: {
          apiUrl: ShellApi.SubmitAppInfo,
          // params: {"test": "111"},
          list: [
            {
              lineType: "single",
              rowList: [
                {
                  type: "v_text",
                  title: "AppKey",
                  key: "appKey",
                  isRequest: true,
                  validators: {
                    notEmpty: {
                      enabled: true,
                      message: "AppKey不能为空"
                    }
                  }
                },
                {
                  type: "v_text",
                  title: "AppSecret",
                  key: "appSecret",
                  isRequest: true,
                  validators: {
                    notEmpty: {
                      enabled: true,
                      message: "AppSecret不能为空"
                    }
                  }
                },
                {
                  type: "v_singleSelect",
                  title: "设备类型",
                  key: "terminalType",
                  data: [
                    {
                      terminalType: "1",
                      value: "总控"
                    },
                    {
                      terminalType: "2",
                      value: "分控"
                    },
                    {
                      terminalType: "3",
                      value: "HubApp"
                    },
                    {
                      terminalType: "4",
                      value: "CCN"
                    }
                  ],
                  selectkey: "terminalType",
                  selectvalue: "value",
                  isRequest: true,
                  validators: {
                    notEmpty: {
                      enabled: true,
                      message: "设备类型不能为空"
                    }
                  }
                },
                {
                  type: "v_singleSelect",
                  title: "部署点",
                  key: "organiztionId",
                  apiUrl: ShellApi.GetOrganiztionList,
                  //params: { aaa: "fff" },
                  selectkey: "organiztionId",
                  selectvalue: "organiztionSN",
                  isRequest: true,
                  validators: {
                    notEmpty: {
                      enabled: true,
                      message: "部署点不能为空"
                    }
                  }
                },
                {
                  type: "v_text",
                  title: "终端识别项",
                  key: "identifyingNumber",
                  isRequest: true,
                  validators: {
                    notEmpty: {
                      enabled: true,
                      message: "AppKey不能为空"
                    }
                  }
                },
                {
                  type: "v_textarea",
                  title: "备注",
                  key: "remark",
                  isRequest: false,
                  validators: {
                    notEmpty: {
                      enabled: false
                    }
                  }
                }
              ]
            }
          ]
        }
      },
      tableOption: {
        tableId: "proofreport",
        tableName: "凭据统计报表",
        url: config.pgyerApiUrl + ShellApi.GetAppInfoList.options.url,
        method: ShellApi.GetAppInfoList.options.method,
        uniqueId: TableUniqueId,
        actions: [
          {
            key: "tableEdit",
            title: "编辑",
            url: ShellApi.GetAppInfoById,
            method: ShellApi.GetAppInfoById.method,
            // params: {
            //   aaa: "fff"
            // },
            tabIdx: 2
          },
          {
            key: "tablePause",
            statuKey: "isDelete",
            // statuObj: {
            //   'false': "启用",
            //   'true': "禁用"
            // },
            title: "启用/禁用",
            tabIdx: 0
          },
          {
            key: "tableDownload",
            url: ShellApi.GetAppXMLDownLoadUrl,
            method: ShellApi.GetAppXMLDownLoadUrl.method,
            title: "下载",
            tabIdx: 1
          }
        ],
        columns: [
          {
            field: "organiztionSN",
            title: "部署点编号",
            align: "center"
          },
          {
            field: "appKey",
            title: "AppKey",
            align: "center"
          },
          {
            field: "appSecret",
            title: "AppSecret",
            align: "center"
          },
          {
            field: "terminalType",
            title: "设备类型",
            align: "center",
            formatter: function(val, row) {
              return TerminalType[row.terminalType];
            }
          },
          {
            field: "isDelete",
            title: "状态",
            align: "center",
            formatter: function(val, row) {
              return row.isDelete ? "启用" : "禁用";
            }
          }
        ]
      }
    };
  },
  methods: {
    rowClick: function(rowItem, element, baseObject) {
      console.log(element);
      let _ = this;
      if (element.id == "tablePause") {
        //  url: ShellApi.UpdateDeleteStatus,
        //     method: ShellApi.UpdateDeleteStatus.method,
        ShellApi.UpdateDeleteStatus;
        let currentAction = _.searchUrl(element);
        let param = {};
        param["isDelete"] = rowItem[currentAction.statuKey] ? 0 : 1;
        param[_.tableOption.uniqueId] = rowItem[_.tableOption.uniqueId];
        $.extend(param, currentAction.params);

        ShellApi.UpdateDeleteStatus(param).then(res => {
          baseObject.$refs.table.operation("refresh");
        });
      }
      debugger;
    },
    searchUrl: function(element) {
      for (let i = 0; i < this.tableOption.actions.length; i++) {
        let actionItem = this.tableOption.actions[i];
        if (actionItem.key == element.id) {
          return actionItem;
        }
      }
    }
  },
  components: { vBasePage }
};
</script>
